A grand hall with dusty chandeliers and: Books line every wall. A strange, cold draft chills the air.
The smell of rotting food fills the air. Pots and pans are scattered everywhere.
A vast room with a beautiful but cracked dance floor. Shadows seem to dance by themselves.
A dark, damp place with the sound of dripping water echoing in the distance.
A cramped space filled with cobwebs and forgotten relics.
A heavy wooden door with light streaming through the cracks. This is your way out.
